ccache /usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -lrt -lpthread CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/lifetime_mistake.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/background_task.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/hello_multithreading_world.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/waiting_for_finish.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/RAII.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/detached_threads.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/joining_threads.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hw.dir/src/chapter_1_2/parallel_accumulate.cpp.o  -o hw  -lpthread
